author: Huawei
description:
In Botswana, a new era in education is rising, where clean energy and smart technology illuminate classrooms, inspiring brighter futures. Through a partnership between the Ministry of Child Welfare and Basic Education and #Huawei, the Zutshwa Smart Village Project is transforming learning for students at Letswai Primary School and Morula Primary School, expanding access to digital education and clean energy. Together, we are building a future where every student can dream bigger, learn more, and power their world through knowledge.

#SmartEducation #DigitalInclusion #Botswana #EducationForAll #SolarPoweredLearning #FutureOfLearning
title: Botswana’s Education Transformation: Empowering Classrooms and Futures
